name: Mr. Cruel
description:
Australian serial child rapist, who attacked three girls in the northern and eastern suburbs of Melbourne, Victoria in the late 1980s and early 1990s, and is the prime suspect in the abduction and murder of a fourth girl, Karmein Chan.
He has never been identified and his three confirmed attacks and suspected murder remain unsolved cold cases.
This illustration is a suggestion of what Mr. Cruel might actually look like.
